channel.title: Help on some questions
channel.description:
1. Iv got the allstars v2 sever and im not sure is theres god wars on it. can you tell me if it is there and how to get to it or if not is there any way of getting it on there?
2. how would a command before turning drops or and off be?
3. how would a command that you teleport some one to a place e.g ::tele (name) (places) how would it be writen
ill be so greatfull if anyone can give me awnsers to them thanks
rob

item.title: Help on some questions
item.dc:creator: @OBLITERSCAPE OBLITERSCAPE
item.description:

oh dear im so bad at this i put this for a guess

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("tele")
            && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Rob")) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
        } else {
            teleportToX = ####;
            teleportToY = ####;
            sendMessage("mod Rob just teleported you!");
        }

Are you able to write it out fully im not the best and only be trying do this for a few days
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2009, 04:49:17 pm[/size][hr]comeon some one must know tell me

Read full topic

item.title: Help on some questions
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Number three’s the one I feel like doing.

You would need an if statement for a command starting with “tele”, a String for the name, and an integer for the place that they’re going. You would have to use a split for this.

I’ll probably be off before you respond, so here’s a hint on the split:

String[] cmd = command.split(" ");

cmd[1] is the target, cmd[2] is the X value, cmd[3] is the Y value, if done like so:
::tele OBLITTERSCAPE 3220 3222

For what it matters, cmd[0] is tele.

Read full topic
